title: June LeBell 101: Guest: Marilyn Horne, Met Opera Mezzo Soprano
teaser: Marilyn Horne is not only one of the world’s greatest and best-known mezzo-sopranos, she’s also a wonderful raconteur, teacher and finder of tomorrow’s super-stars. Listen as she speaks with June LeBell about some of the great young singers the Marilyn Horne Foundation has brought to us, from Stephanie Blythe to  Nicole Cabell, with lots of music to match the conversation.
